alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Gallatin; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:56PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Broadwater, eastern Jefferson and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Three Forks, or 27 miles south of Townsend, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Forks, Trident and Missouri Headwaters State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 270 and 282. Highway 12 between mile markers 97 and 109. Highway 287 between mile markers 90 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
